actions.query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `infonames` (
  `id` int(50),
  `name` varchar(30),
  `friendly_name` varchar(50),
  `content` TEXT(1024),
  `image_link` varchar(50),
  `views` int(8),
  PRIMARY KEY (`name`)
) DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
actions.name: Run SQL Query

actions.query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `warnings` (
  `case_id` int(3),
  `user_id` varchar(30),
  `points` int(2),
  `reason` varchar(1024),
  `moderator_id` varchar(30),
  PRIMARY KEY (`case_id`)
) DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
actions.name: Run SQL Query
